verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: plans] [ARG1: to appoint television personalty Dr. Oz — who grew up in Delaware — to his Council on Sport , Fitness and Nutrition] .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] plans to [V: appoint] [ARG1: television personalty Dr. Oz — who grew up in Delaware —] [ARG2: to his Council on Sport , Fitness and Nutrition] .
President Donald Trump plans to appoint [ARG1: television personalty Dr. Oz] — [R-ARG1: who] [V: grew] up [ARGM-LOC: in Delaware] — to his Council on Sport , Fitness and Nutrition .
